meanings.definition: To protrude through an abnormal opening
meanings.sent1: The disc herniates from the spine.
meanings.sent2: The balloon herniates out of the box.
meanings.sent3: The toast herniates from the toaster with a pop.
meanings.sent4: The secret herniates from her lips, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The watermelon herniates from the overloaded grocery bag, crashing to the ground.

meanings.sent1: His muscles herniate under the strain of lifting.
meanings.sent2: The tire herniates after hitting a sharp rock.
meanings.sent3: The overstuffed suitcase herniates at the seams.
meanings.sent4: The truth herniates in the midst of all the lies.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors herniate from the painting, catching everyone's eye.
